caller_intent: The caller is attempting to make a payment for an insurance-related matter, providing banking details (routing number, account number, and credit card information) to process the transaction.
resolution_steps: Agent confirms the payment amount ($658) and verifies the code (28621).
Caller provides routing number (053000219) and account number (6952440367).
Agent repeats the details to confirm accuracy.
Caller clarifies the final digits of the account number (562) and confirms the payment method (credit card).
Agent informs the caller the payment will be processed and verified within 48–72 hours.
Agent requests the caller to contact back next month before the 18th for verification.
systems_referenced: Payment processing system (implied by reference to 'sistema')
summary: A caller made a payment for an insurance-related obligation, providing detailed banking information. The agent confirmed the details, processed the payment, and scheduled a follow-up verification call next month. The caller was assured the payment would be processed within 48–72 hours.
